greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sequence is defined by property that binomial transform of (a0,a1,a2,a3,...) = (a0,a0,a0,a1,a1,a1,a2,a2,a2,a3,a3,a3,...).
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
mathematica: a[n_] := a[n] = Sum[If[k<3, 1, a[Quotient[k, 3]]]*(-1)^(n-k)*Binomial[n, k], {k, 0, n}];
Table[a[n], {n, 0, 45}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Apr 04 2017, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Jonas Wallgren_
